channel.title: Skill help menu thing
channel.description: Is there a way to get it so when you click on one of the skills (like attack, defence, smithing, mining, etc) it will bring up the window that shows you what level you need to be and what things you can use?

item.title: Skill help menu thing
item.dc:creator: @tufferred tufferred
item.description:
@tufferred wrote:

Is there a way to get it so when you click on one of the skills (like attack, defence, smithing, mining, etc) it will bring up the window that shows you what level you need to be and what things you can use?

Read full topic
